title: @Riot I doubt you will get to this...
body:
I don't have a clue about just how much sway you hold over Riot as a company, but if you do hold a bit of weight there, could you please talk to them about a change that a scrubby bronze wannabe Azir main wants to see???

Can you pretty please make the sound that plays when Azir's soldier is about to disappear a bit more clear, because as it stands its incredibly quiet and its really hard to tell when they are about to disappear and this really affects my gameplay to the point where i just choose to use the default skin because its more noticeable, which is a shame because the particles are really cool. So can we please get new sounds for Galactic Azir???

replies.body: Thank you sir for contributing to the noblest of causes.
They would change a skin that has been released so recently. Really, they never change skins. The default skin is great anyways, just use that.

Well none of the recently released skins have really offended clarity-wise as Galactic Azir.

If it was something stupid like the passive turret then I would be fine with it but the soldiers are such a core part of Azir's playstyle so I really can't let this slide.
